casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Sylvester Eugene HARDING. No. 402P11-6. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Jonathan Shaw, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Sylvester Eugene Harding, Maury, for Harding, Sylvester Eugene. William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of September 2015 by Defendant to Amend Notice of Appeal and Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
